summary: Three sexy young women are hired to ensure that three college students don't pass their final exams, which would preclude one of them from inheriting a family fortune.
cast: Dennis Drake|Steven Holt|Peter Brady Reardon|Nitchie Barrett|Cindy Manion|Katie Stelletello|Katt Shea|Lynda Wiesmeier|Jo-Ann Marshall|Leonard Haas|Jerry Butler|Anthony Matteo|Leslie Barrett|Wayne Franson|Myra Chasen|Lara Berk|William Hardy|William Solo|Robert Poletick|Marc Cronogue|Jack Mead|Virgil Roberson|Beverly Brown|Lynette Sheldon|Jack Burkhard|Perry Rosen|Dayton Callie|Bruce Smolanoff|Jerry Winsett|Joe Geschwind|Craig Horrall|Samuelle Easton|Jim Bonney|Alan L. Farina|Ian Shaw|Wendell P. MacNeal IV|Charles J. Van Streader III|Phil LoPresti|James Louis Fleming|Little Oral Annie|Annette Heinz|Sharon Kane|Tish Ambrose|David Ambrose|Karen Culliver
title: Preppies: Estudiantes en apuros
